subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the SelectBox UI component.

subMembers.name: acceptCustomValue
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the UI component allows a user to enter a custom value. Requires the [onCustomItemCreating] handler implementation.

subMembers.name: customItemCreateEvent
subMembers.description: Specifies the DOM event after which the custom item should be created. Applies only if [acceptCustomValue] is enabled.

subMembers.name: fieldComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [fieldTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: fieldRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [fieldTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: fieldTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for the text field. Must contain the [TextBox] UI component.

subMembers.name: placeholder
subMembers.description: The text that is provided as a hint in the select box editor.

subMembers.name: showSelectionControls
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not to display selection controls.

properties.name: dxSelectBox
properties.description: The SelectBox UI component is an editor that allows an end user to select an item from a drop-down list.

Events.name: onChange
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component loses focus after the text field's content was changed using the keyboard.

Events.name: onClosed
Events.description: A function that is executed once the drop-down editor is closed.

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: onCopy
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component's input has been copied.

Events.name: onCustomItemCreating
Events.description: A function that is executed when a user adds a custom item. Requires [acceptCustomValue] to be set to **true**.

Events.name: onCut
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component's input has been cut.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onEnterKey
Events.description: A function that is executed when the Enter key has been pressed while the UI component is focused.

Events.name: onFocusIn
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component gets focus.

Events.name: onFocusOut
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component loses focus.

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onInput
Events.description: A function that is executed each time the UI component's input is changed while the UI component is focused.

Events.name: onItemClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a list item is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onKeyDown
Events.description: A function that is executed when a user is pressing a key on the keyboard.

Events.name: onKeyUp
Events.description: A function that is executed when a user releases a key on the keyboard.

Events.name: onOpened
Events.description: A function that is executed once the drop-down editor is opened.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onPaste
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component's input has been pasted.

Events.name: onSelectionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed when a list item is selected or selection is canceled.

Events.name: onValueChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after the UI component's [value] is changed.

Events.name: customItemCreating
Events.description: Raised when a user adds a custom item.

Types.name: ChangeEvent
Types.description: The type of the [change] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ClosedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [closed] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ContentReadyEvent
Types.description: The type of the [contentReady] event handler's argument.

Types.name: CopyEvent
Types.description: The type of the [copy] event handler's argument.

Types.name: CustomItemCreatingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [customItemCreating] event handler's argument.

Types.name: CutEvent
Types.description: The type of the [cut] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: EnterKeyEvent
Types.description: The type of the [enterKey] event handler's argument.

Types.name: FocusInEvent
Types.description: The type of the [focusIn] event handler's argument.

Types.name: FocusOutEvent
Types.description: The type of the [focusOut] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InputEvent
Types.description: The type of the [input] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemClickEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemClick] event handler's argument.

Types.name: KeyDownEvent
Types.description: The type of the [keyDown] event handler's argument.

Types.name: KeyUpEvent
Types.description: The type of the [keyUp] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OpenedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [opened] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: PasteEvent
Types.description: The type of the [paste] event handler's argument.

Types.name: SelectionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [selectionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ValueChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [valueChanged] event handler's argument.
